text: Apodasmia is a group of plants in the Restionaceae described as a genus in 1998.B.G. Briggs & L.A.S. Johnson. 1998. Telopea 7: 371 It is native to Australia, New Zealand, and Chile.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ; Species * Apodasmia brownii (Hook.f.) B.G.Briggs & L.A.S.Johnson \- SA, Tas, Vic * Apodasmia chilensis (Gay) B.G.Briggs & L.A.S.Johnson \- southern Chile * Apodasmia similis (Edgar) B.G.Briggs & L.A.S.Johnson \- New Zealand (North + South + Chatham Is) ==References== Category:Restionaceae Category:Poales genera Category:Taxa named by Barbara G. Briggs Category:Taxa named by Lawrence Alexander Sidney Johnson
title: Apodasmia (plant)
